import React,{useState}from'react';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Form from'react-bootstrap/Form';import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ClienteForm=_ref=>{let{initialData={},onSave}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:initialData.name||'',cuit:initialData.cuit||'',email:initialData.email||''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSave(formData);setFormData({name:'',cuit:'',email:''});// Limpiar los campos después de guardar
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:initialData.id?'Editar Cliente':'Agregar Cliente'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{className:"my-3",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3 col-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{htmlFor:"cliente-name",children:"Nombre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",id:"cliente-name",name:"name",placeholder:"Nombre",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,autoComplete:"name",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3 col-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{htmlFor:"cliente-cuit",children:"CUIT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",id:"cliente-cuit",name:"cuit",placeholder:"CUIT",value:formData.cuit,onChange:handleChange,autoComplete:"cuit",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3 col-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{htmlFor:"cliente-email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"email",id:"cliente-email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,autoComplete:"email",required:true})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-success",type:"submit",children:"Guardar"})]})]});};export default ClienteForm;
